CustomField.description: Number of days excluding weekends between NEP Received Date and Contract received date. If either field is blank, this field will be null
CustomField.formula: If(OR(ISNULL(NEP_Received_Date__c),ISNULL(Contract_Received__c)) , NULL ,(NEP_Received_Date__c - Contract_Received__c) - 2*( floor((NEP_Received_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Contract_Received__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)))
CustomField.label: NEP after Contracts Timeframe
